sentences.en: A facultative anaerobic bacillus strain Xg 01 is isolated from the dirt.
sentences.cn: 从污物中分离出一株兼性厌氧芽孢杆菌,它可产生大量的果胶酶.

sentences.en: Acetic acid is formed as an intermediate in the anaerobic fermentation of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats.
sentences.cn: 醋酸是碳水化合物, 蛋白质和脂肪在厌氧发酵时所形成的中间体.

sentences.en: Anaerobic respiration occurs only in particularly active tissues such as muscles during severe exercise.
sentences.cn: 厌氧呼吸只有在处于剧烈运动状态的肌肉等特别活跃的组织中才会发生。

sentences.en: Bottom line? Anaerobic metabolism utilizes only glucose as an energy source.
sentences.cn: 底线? 无氧代谢仅使用一种能源,葡萄糖.

sentences.en: Design, start - up and operation of anaerobic reactors are influenced by many factors.
sentences.cn: 厌氧生物反应器的设计 、 启动和运行控制受许多因素的影响.

sentences.en: If all the dissolved oxygen is used, an anaerobic ( without air ) decomposition process occurs.
sentences.cn: 如果耗尽了溶解氧, 就会发生厌 气性 分解过程.

sentences.en: Infection, especially anaerobic infection, is much more apt to occur.
sentences.cn: 感染, 特别是厌氧感染很容易发生.

sentences.en: Segregation of fatty material is a serious problem in anaerobic sludge digestion units.
sentences.cn: 厌氧污泥消化单元中脂肪物质的分离是个难题.

sentences.en: The anaerobic breakdown of glucose is called glycolysis.
sentences.cn: 厌氧分解葡萄糖称为酵解.

sentences.en: The optimal conditions for the anaerobic digestion are the following.
sentences.cn: 厌气消化的最佳条件如下.

sentences.en: The slime layer consists of one aerobic and one anaerobic sublayer.
sentences.cn: 粘膜层由好气分层和厌气分层所组成.

sentences.en: The use of sulfates and carbon dioxide requires strictly anaerobic conditions.
sentences.cn: 使用硫酸盐和二氧化碳时,需要严格的厌氧条件.

sentences.en: Thelevel and composition Of ECPs in anaerobic sludgeswere also discussed.
sentences.cn: 文中还对厌氧污泥ECP的含量、成分作了分析和探讨.

sentences.en: This is 19 times the energy obtainable under anaerobic circumstances.
sentences.cn: 这是无氧时所得能量的19倍.

sentences.en: Under anaerobic conditions nitrates and nitrites are both reduced by a process called denitrification.
sentences.cn: 在厌氧条件下,硝酸盐和亚硝酸盐通过脱硝作用被还原.

words.tran_cn: [微][生物] 厌氧性生物，[微] 厌氧菌
[微]厌氧的，[生物]厌气的；没有气而能生活的

phrases.tran_cn: 厌氧性胶水；厌氧黏合剂
厌氧细菌，厌氧菌；嫌气细菌
缺氧情况，绝氧条件；嫌气条件

trans.tran_cn: 厌氧菌的，厌氧菌产生的，（细菌等）能在无空气（或无氧）情况下生活（或成长）的，无氧
trans.tran_en: not needing oxygen in order to live
